welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Snaresbrook, a charming city known for its picturesque streets and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the beauty and culture this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Star Alliance and other non-aligned airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Oneworld and other non-aligned airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The second newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly SkyTeam and other non-aligned airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and Iberia.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport with a 45-minute time limit per session.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport is used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal, with the option to upgrade to a faster connection for a fee.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome provides a comfortable and efficient environment for travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southend Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Southend Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
